sect3.title: Overview
sect3.para: You can export your image in cel format, which is short for KiSS cel format, when you choose the .cel extension, or explicitly choose KISS CEL as file type in the export dialog. This file format is used to create and display digital dress-up paper dolls.
There are no settings to choose from. No export dialog will open after you have chosen your filename. It will automatically start the export.
